content: Whether you want to kill every last one or not, be sure to at least clear out the far left side of the lower pathway first, and behind a tree you can find the final **Meditation Spot** for this temple area. If you remove all the enemies on the opposite side, you can grab a green Wisp and absorb it.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Temple_of_Yellow_Flowers_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Temple of Yellow Flowers Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Temple Entrance'.
The content is as follows:
Whether you want to kill every last one or not, be sure to at least clear out the far left side of the lower pathway first, and behind a tree you can find the final **Meditation Spot** for this temple area. If you remove all the enemies on the opposite side, you can grab a green Wisp and absorb it.
